p: Concerning Tractional Retinal Detachment (TRD), this is one of the most serious and costly pathologies, varying, depending on surgery type, from 1647 euros/patient for laser prophylaxis to 6690 euros/patient for vitrectomy [ 79]. The annual incidence of TRD in Spain is 1/10,000 [ 80], meaning 4700 cases/year.
